title: New pc, game lags when i move the champion
body:
I just finished my new pc build, ive assembled it and all and downloaded the game, i have around 300 fps at full settings but whenever i right click the champ it lags like i would have ping and the image delays really fast like really laggy. Why? i dont understand if i press A and left click same happends it lags whenever i click
If i press on the minimap somewhere the champ will delay for the first second then will go the point with no problems
anyone has any idea please? since i just installed the game should i install additional programs or directx 12 ? or something ?
I want to mention that while lagging my ping (around 30) and fps stays normal and acts normal

I had the exact same issue upon finishing my pc, i didnt at first but during one of the soon after patches it started, as far as im aware its on riots end  due to it only happenimg after a specific patch but can be fixed by going into your settings and capping your fps to 144 or whatever the highest setting that inst uncapped

Since it's a new PC, it's important to double check and make sure that your drivers are all up to date so it can render the game without issue.  There could be other factors too like a poor installation.  I suggest going through each step of the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure that everything is in order.  

You can also check if this is a lag spike by running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for an overview.  I hope that helps!
Noone of these seemed to work..

That's a bummer to hear, but we'd like to take a closer look!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can assist.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well to attach some logs which will provide us with more context.  We'll reply back asap!

So, I don't know how to message a rioter directly or anything, so I just decided to say it on the most recent post I could find. I'm sorry this is really off-topic, but I don't know where else to put it, since I made a discussion but it's been a day and no one has answered yet and I'm getting impatient because I can't play league. I accidentally uninstalled the new client, then I read that it says not to uninstall the new client. It's on the post I made on the account YouOnlyHook, if you would please check it out and give me an answer. That would be great if you could do it as soon as possible. Thank you.
